output:
  acronymsdown::md_format
acronyms:
  sorting: alphabetical-case-insensitive
  include_unused: false
  keys:
    - shortname: Qt
      longname: Quarto
    - shortname: iQt
      longname: inside-Quarto
    - shortname: aA
      longname: alphabetically
    - shortname: H
      longname: handle

# Introduction {#intro}

This \acr{Qt} extension adds the ability to automatically \acr{H}
\acr{iQt} acronyms.

Would love to be able to sort \acr{aA}, independent of letter case.
